titleStmt.title: A memoriall of the famous monuments and charitable almesdeedes of the right worshipfull Maister William Lambe esquire somtime gentleman of the chappell, in the reigne of the most renowmed [sic] King Henrie the eight, &c. and late citizen of London, and free of the right worshipfull companie of clothworkers: deceased the 21. of April. An. 1580. Recorded in print, according to the various and trueth of his last will and testament by Abraham Fleming.
titleStmt.author: Fleming, Abraham, 1552?-1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Imprinted by Henrie Denham, for Thomas Turner, and are to be sold at his shop at Guild-Hall gate],

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; place of publication and publication date from STC.
Running title reads: A memoriall of M. Lambs almesdeedes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
